reviews.review_msg: Ian is very nice! his tests are fair! just that he moved too fast when he explained slides. Overall, GOOD!!

Well, he is easy and nice to every student. BUT THE TAs ARE stupid, coz Scott said the answer close to 0.47 (0.40-55)are both right for the answer for the midterm, BUT the TA need you to get exactly answer. I really want to know how to TA can be TA ! The marking is not fair coz of the TA. Please Scott, tell the TA not to mark so hard on the exam
